title.value: Выращивание томата в продленной культуре с использование гидропонной технологии в остекленных теплицах
Tomato growing in the prolonged crop with the hydroponic technology use in glass greenhouses

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Autko, A.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Dolbik, M.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was realized an experimental study of the influence of synthetic types of materials, which were located in the technological sleeve, on tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum) growing in extended culture. In the article the material on types of water-holding material influence located in a technological sleeve at tomato cultivation with the use of hydroponic technology on productivity, quality of fruits, mineral fertilizers use, and also on temperature and air humidity in a technological sleeve was presented. Research results showed that application of water retaining materials in the form of polyether geotextile cloth, unwoven needled fabric, and geotextile fabric provided increasing of tomato yielding capacity on 8.4-9.9%, expenses of nutrition elements per 1 ton of tomatoes lowered on 8.1-8.9%. This fact proved that water retaining materials are effective for the hydroponic technology of tomato growing in greenhouse conditions.
